column4: > hi there. i was a long time ubuntu user but ubuntu 8.10 with compiz was becoming too heavy for my system so i went to do a custom lean ubuntu with instructions from DWW. i did a custom partitioning with /, /home, /usr, /junk and /av. now my doubt is nautilus doesnt show any folders lile pictures etc in my home folder and i cant mount the custom mounts using my account
i can try, please se PM
